  • Method Details

    • move

      void move(EntityPos2D pos)
      Moves the components in the GUI.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position where the components are moved.

    • setDirection

      void setDirection(Directions dir)
      Sets the direction of the arpions, so they can move in the right way.
      Parameters:
      dir - the direction where the are going to lay.

    • getHeroComponent

      HeroComponent getHeroComponent()

      Returns:
      the HeroComponent.

      Getter for the ArpionComponents.
      Returns:
      a List of ArpionComponents.

    • getBounds

      Pair<Integer,Integer> getBounds()
      Getter for the GUI bounds.
      Returns:
      a Pair<Integer, Integer> with the GUI bounds inside.

    • getStartPos

      EntityPos2D getStartPos()
      Getter for the GUI start position of the HeroComponent.
      Returns:
      the coords of the start position of the component.

    • getFreeComponent

      Optional<ArpionComponent> getFreeComponent()
      Getter for an ArpionComponent.
      Returns:
      Optional if there is one not busy, Optional.empty otherwhise.

    • restoreBullet

      void restoreBullet(ArpionComponent bullet, EntityPos2D charPos, Directions dir)
      Restores the Arpion from the MAXY position to his normal position.
      Parameters:
      bullet - the Arpion which is going to be restored.
      charPos - the coords of the main Character.
      dir - the Direction of the main character.

    • raiseArpion

      void raiseArpion(ArpionComponent arpion)
      Tells the given ArpionComponent to raise.
      Parameters:
      arpion - the arpion which needs to be raised.

    • getVisualTest

      VisualPanelTest getVisualTest()
      Getter for the panel in order to add it on the main GUI.
      Returns:
